QuestData.Title: A Worthy Challenge: Yan-zhu the Uncasked
QuestData.Description: $n, I need you to assemble a hearty group and lead them into Stormstout Brewery. Activate the Challenger's Orb therein, and evaporate Yan-zhu the Uncasked.$B$BReturn to me when you've completed this challenge, and I shall reward you handsomely.
QuestData.LogDescription: Complete the Stormstout Brewery Challenge Mode.

Objectives.Objective: Complete the Stormstout Brewery Challenge Mode
